sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: Returns the current version of the GUI Procedure Library. Because the GUI Procedure Library is expected to grow, new versions will probably be made available at our web site http://www.holtsoft.com/turing. If you wish to use features that do not appear in earlier versions of the library, you can have your program check that the current available version meets the programs needs. GUI.GetVersion returns an integer from 100 - 999 and is read as 1.00 to 9.99.
sections.text_content: Returns the current version of the GUI Procedure Library. Because the GUI Procedure Library is expected to grow, new versions will probably be made available at our web site http://www.holtsoft.com/turing. If you wish to use features that do not appear in earlier versions of the library, you can have your program check that the current available version meets the programs needs. GUI.GetVersion returns an integer from 100 - 999 and is read as 1.00 to 9.99.
sections.mdown_content: Returns the current version of the GUI Procedure Library. Because the GUI Procedure Library is expected to grow, new versions will probably be made available at our web site **http://www.holtsoft.com/turing**. If you wish to use features that do not appear in earlier versions of the library, you can have your program check that the current available version meets the programs needs. **GUI.GetVersion **returns an integer from 100 - 999 and is read as 1.00 to 9.99.

sections.title: Example
code:
import GUI in "%oot/lib/GUI"
        if GUI.GetVersion < 110 then
            put "You must update to at least version 1.1 of the"
            put "GUI Procedure Library to use this program."
            return
        end if
sections.raw_content: The following program fragment immediately exits if OOT does not support version 1.1 of the GUI Procedure Library
sections.text_content: The following program fragment immediately exits if OOT does not support version 1.1 of the GUI Procedure Library
sections.mdown_content: The following program fragment immediately exits if OOT does not support version 1.1 of the GUI Procedure Library

sections.title: Details
sections.raw_content: In version 1.00 (shipped with MacOOT 1.5), GUI.GetVersion did not exist.
sections.text_content: In version 1.00 (shipped with MacOOT 1.5), GUI.GetVersion did not exist.
sections.mdown_content: In version 1.00 (shipped with MacOOT 1.5), **GUI.GetVersion **did not exist.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling GUI.GetVersion, not by calling GetVersion.
sections.text_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling GUI.GetVersion, not by calling GetVersion.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **GUI.GetVersion**, not by calling **GetVersion**.
